mapper.select: SELECT att_value_id FROM standard_product_unit_att_value WHERE standard_product_unit_att_name_id = (SELECT id from standard_product_unit_att_name WHERE standard_product_unit_id = (SELECT standard_product_unit_id from sku WHERE id = #{skuId}) and att_name_id = #{attNameId})

select att_value_id from standard_product_unit_att_value where standard_product_unit_att_name_id=( select id from standard_product_unit_att_name where standard_product_unit_id=( select standard_product_unit_id from standard_unit where id=( select standard_unit_id from commodity_product_unit where id=#{puId} ) ) and type=1 and att_name_id=#{attNameId} )

SELECT att_value_custom FROM standard_product_unit_att_value WHERE standard_product_unit_att_name_id = (SELECT id from standard_product_unit_att_name WHERE standard_product_unit_id = #{standardProductUnitId} and att_name_id = 5) and platform_id = #{platformId}
mapper.sql: id, standard_product_unit_att_name_id, att_value_id, specification_code, att_value_custom, sort_value, create_time, update_time, platform_id, picture_url
mapper.select: SELECT spua.id, spua.standard_product_unit_att_name_id, spua.att_value_id, spua.specification_code, spua.att_value_custom, spua.sort_value, spua.platform_id, spua.picture_url, av.`value` att_value FROM standard_product_unit_att_value spua LEFT JOIN attribute_value av on av.id = spua.att_value_id WHERE spua.standard_product_unit_att_name_id = #{standardProductUnitAttNameId} ORDER BY spua.id

SELECT spuav.id, spuav.standard_product_unit_att_name_id, spuav.att_value_id, spuav.specification_code, spuav.att_value_custom, spuav.sort_value FROM standard_product_unit_att_value spuav LEFT JOIN standard_product_unit_att_name spuan on spuan.id = spuav.standard_product_unit_att_name_id WHERE spuav.att_value_id = #{attValueId} and spuan.standard_product_unit_id = #{productId}

SELECT spuav.id, spuav.standard_product_unit_att_name_id, spuav.att_value_id, picture_url FROM standard_product_unit_att_value spuav,standard_product_unit_att_name spuan WHERE spuav.standard_product_unit_att_name_id = spuan.id AND spuav.att_value_id = #{attributeValueId} and spuan.att_name_id = #{attributeNameId} and spuan.standard_product_unit_id = #{productId}

SELECT spuav.*,spuan.att_name_id FROM standard_product_unit_att_value spuav LEFT JOIN standard_product_unit_att_name spuan ON spuan.id = spuav.standard_product_unit_att_name_id WHERE spuan.standard_product_unit_id = (SELECT standard_product_unit_id from standard_unit WHERE id = #{standardUnitId}) and spuan.show_picture = 1

select att_value_id FROM standard_product_unit_att_value WHERE standard_product_unit_att_name_id= (select id FROM standard_product_unit_att_name WHERE standard_product_unit_id=#{id} AND att_name_id=4 AND type=1)
